entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 22. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023
